title: Hint
text:
1) Identify the dimensions of the matrices:
• B is a 2×3 matrix.
• D is a 3×3 matrix.

2) Since the number of columns of B (3) matches the number of rows of D (3), the product BD is well-defined and will be a 2×3 matrix.

3) Label the entries: let
B $$=$$ [ [3, $$6$$, 4],
[-8, $$0$$, 12] ]
and
D $$=$$ [ [2, $$-3$$, 12],
[9, $$3$$, 1],
...
